Job Description:
A computer science or engineering Bachelor's degree from a leading college or university  (other majors considered with solid prior experience) 
3- 5 years experience in hands- on,  windows and web based application software development
Excellent written and oral communications skills
Ability to synthesize and document requirements
Excellent software design,  coding,  and unit testing skills
Ability to prioritize effectively and handle shifting priorities professionallyTechnology Experience Requirements

Minimum of 2 year of experience developing Windows applications in .NET. required.
C# language experiences a strong plus.
Minimum of 2 year of experience developing e- commerce applications/ components using C#,  VB.NET,  Java,  or ASP.
Participation in the complete life- cycle of multiple enterprise- wide,  web- based applications
Solid working knowledge of XML,  Web Services and object- oriented techniques
Demonstrated expertise writing relational database access components for client server or web applications. MSSQL2005/ 2008,  Oracle 10G and ADO.NET experience preferred.
Demonstrated knowledge of Microsoft .NET architecture best practices.
Relevant Additional Technology Experience
ASP,  ADO,  COM,  C 
Experience with automated unit testing tools such as NUnit
Object- oriented analysis and design using UML and tools such as Rational Rose,  Together
